DOC.brief_summary: This study 8-week evaluation investigational drug treat depression bipolar patient . Depressed patient give either investigational drug placebo receive psychiatric assessment depression weekly visit . Study drug study-related visit provide cost patient . The patient agree meet study research staff roughly 11 clinic visit .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Patients must provide write informed consent . Diagnosis Bipolar II Disorder currently depress minimum last 8 week . Exclusion Patients must suicidal . Patients must history nonresponse antidepressant treatment . Patients must clinical history substance dependence past year abuse within 4 week prior study entry . Patients must epilepsy hypothyroidism .
